term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - absolute photopeak efficiency
term.title: absolute photopeak efficiency

item.text: Of a γ-ray spectrometer, the counting efficiency when only the events recorded in the photopeak are considered.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1548 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
